Vouch Mobile in Pennsylvania: Unlimited Plans on AT&T's Network

Get unlimited talk, text & data in the Keystone State for just $30/month. No credit check required.

Pennsylvania at a Glance

Data from Pennsylvania Census Data

From Philly's historic streets to Pittsburgh's tech renaissance, Pennsylvania is a state of contrasts. Vouch Mobile bridges them all with reliable AT&T coverage at a price that works for steel workers and software developers alike.

AT&T Network Coverage in Pennsylvania

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Pennsylvania residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Keystone State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Pennsylvania, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Major Pennsylvania Cities We Cover

Vouch Mobile provides excellent coverage in all major Pennsylvania metropolitan areas:

Philadelphia

Full 5G coverage throughout Greater Philadelphia, from Center City to the suburbs

Pittsburgh

Comprehensive coverage in Western Pennsylvania, including Oakland and the Strip District

Allentown

Strong coverage throughout the Lehigh Valley

Harrisburg

Excellent coverage in the state capital

State College

Full coverage around Penn State campus

Reading

Reliable service in Berks County

Why Pennsylvania Residents Choose Vouch Mobile

  • Pennsylvania's average phone bill of $112/month is a significant expense—Vouch cuts that by 73%.
  • Whether you're on SEPTA, commuting on the Turnpike, or working in Pittsburgh's tech hub, you need coverage that works.
  • No credit check means Penn State students, new PA residents, and gig workers can sign up instantly.
  • AT&T's network covers Pennsylvania from Philadelphia to Pittsburgh, with excellent coverage along the I-76 and I-80 corridors.

The PA DCED shows that Pennsylvania has a high economic data, making affordable phone service even more valuable.

How to Get Started in Pennsylvania

  1. Check Your Phone: Make sure your phone is unlocked and compatible. Learn how to check.
  2. Choose Your Plan: Select our $30/month unlimited plan.
  3. Order Your SIM: Free shipping to any Pennsylvania address.
  4. Activate Online: Simple activation takes just minutes. See our switching guide.
  5. Start Saving: Enjoy unlimited service across Pennsylvania.

Pennsylvania Coverage FAQ

Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Pennsylvania using AT&T's network. From Philadelphia to Pittsburgh, Allentown to State College, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Keystone State.

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Pennsylvania. AT&T provides extensive 5G coverage in Philadelphia and Pittsburgh, plus reliable LTE across the state.

Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Pennsylvania. The average Pennsylvanian pays $112/month for phone service, so you could save over $984 per year by switching to Vouch.

No credit check required. Whether you're a Temple student, a new Philadelphia resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Pennsylvania address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

Yes! 5G is available in Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, Allentown, Harrisburg, Reading, Scranton, and many other Pennsylvania cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

Yes. You'll have coverage throughout the SEPTA system, including subway stations, buses, and regional rail throughout Greater Philadelphia.

Yes. AT&T's network covers communities throughout Pennsylvania, including the Poconos, Pennsylvania Dutch Country, and most rural areas. Coverage may vary in very remote locations.
